TopicTitle: TLC - Tiny Little Craft - an Ant Engine mini drone!

Articles.Content:
Hello all,

Here is my newest creation, the Tiny Little Craft, or TLC for short. It is a very small drone, powered by one Ant Engine. I made this in KSP .25, with NEAR (not sure if it works without) and TweakScale (to reduce the size of the landing gear and tail fin). To not waste all the fuel, use short bursts of power (by the way, Squad implemented a new feature - Z for full throttle) when speed gets too low. It is essentially a glider. Happy flying!

Also, how do I upload .craft files? I would do so if someone asks for it.

-turbine495

To upload you would need any sort of cloud hosting. Most of us have dropbox, but any hosting site that lets you share should do the trick.

Also, bigger picture so we can actually see the "machine"?
